content: LankaTel Knowledge Base contains comprehensive information for customer support. Categories: Company Information, Service Plans, Billing & Payments, Technical Support, Account Management, Installation, Data Usage & FUP, FAQs & Troubleshooting, Support Channels.

For information about data packages, voice plans, SMS packages, and value-added services, refer to: data_packages.jsonl, voice_sms_packages.jsonl, value_added_services.jsonl. These contain pricing, validity, activation codes, and eligibility information.

For billing cycles, payment methods, bill disputes, taxes, and refund policies, refer to: billing_payments.jsonl. Key topics: Due dates, late fees, payment channels, auto-debit setup, billing disputes.

For troubleshooting internet issues, mobile data problems, router configuration, and connectivity issues, refer to: faq_troubleshooting.jsonl. Common issues: No internet, slow speed, WiFi problems, cannot make calls.

For account changes, password reset, plan upgrades/downgrades, ownership transfer, and service cancellation, refer to: account_management.jsonl. Key topics: MyLankaTel app, profile updates, suspensions, conversions.

For new connection registration, required documents, installation process, and equipment information, refer to: installation_connections.jsonl. Covers mobile SIM, FTTH fiber, ADSL, and fixed wireless.
For data usage tracking, Fair Usage Policy, speed reduction, data add-ons, and usage tips, refer to: data_usage_fup.jsonl. Key topics: FUP limits, reset dates, peak hours, data sharing.

For support contact information, hotline numbers, operating hours, and channel availability, refer to: customer_support.jsonl, support_hours.jsonl. Key contacts: 1234 (general), 1235 (technical), 1236 (billing).
For service center locations, retail outlet hours, and coverage information, refer to: locations.jsonl. Includes service centers, retail stores, payment partners across Sri Lanka.
For company overview, mission, vision, certifications, and CSR initiatives, refer to: company_information.jsonl, company_history.jsonl. Public corporate information and milestones.
